mcq.statement: How do hepatitis A, B, and C affect the liver and spread to others?

options.a: Spread the same way and affect liver similarly
options.b: Spread in different ways and affect the liver differently

mcq.one_liner: Although hepatitis A, B, and C cause similar symptoms, they are **spread in different ways and affect the liver differently**.
